name: GAMADEV
description:
This game is made for BTP Game jam; the theme is game development, so i decided to make a clicker/idle game where you play as a game developer and you have to gain as much experience and level up as much as you can, you can upgrade your setup your hardware and all, there will be added more features where you can hire a team and work together,

This game is still under dev, and this the first release for the BTP game jam.
